'''Beta 1.19.70.26''' (Android) or '''Preview 1.19.70.26''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox) is the fifth and final beta/''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.19.70]], released on March 1-2, 2023,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/13574296686221|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.19.70.26|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=March 1, 2023}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
'''General'''
* Fixed several issues that were affecting the gameplay experience and stability of the game.
* Fixed an issue that prevented Boat paddling sounds from playing. ({{bug|MCPE-166558}})
* Items no longer float away after they are thrown out of water. ({{bug|MCPE-167251}})
'''Technical'''
* Player projectiles no longer snap to the block grid when spawned from an event with <code>born</code> spawn method.</onlyinclude>
